headline: Multibeam Secures $31 Million in Series B Financing to Accelerate Global Deployment of E-Beam Lithography Production Solutions
summary: Investors include Onto Innovation, Lam Capital, UMC Capital, and MediaTek Capital Multibeam System Multibeam's High-Productivity Multicolumn E-Beam Lithography System SANTA CLARA, Calif., July 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Multibeam Corp. today announced that it has raised $31 million in Series B funds from global investors led by Onto Innovation Inc. (NYSE: ONTO), a leader in process control solutions for advanced nodes and advanced packaging, and Lam Capital, the venture capital arm of Lam Rese

headline: Lam Research Earnings: What To Look For From LRCX
summary: Semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) will be reporting earnings this Wednesday after the bell. Here’s what you need to know.
